title: Verify one credit-card payment
custom_preconds: Verify Credit_Cards Field in Order File of PVCC/Bushnell

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. 1. Create an order and pay it in full with a credit card payment method.
custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. 1. Credit_Cards field for the order should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 digits of the card number.

title: Verify multiple credit-card payments using the same credit card

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create an order and pay it partially with a credit card, leaving the balance on a receivable
2. In a subsequent transaction, pay the balance using the same card.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 1. Credit_Cards field for the order should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 digits of the card number.
2. The credit card should NOT be listed twice.

title: Verify multiple credit-card payments using the same credit card non-sequentially

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create an order and pay it partially with a credit card, leaving the balance on a receivable
2. In a subsequent transaction, partially pay the balance using a different credit card. The description for this payment method should sort alphabetically before the first payment's payment method--e.g., first pay with "Visa" and then "Aviator Visa."
3. In a third transaction, pay the remaining balance with the first card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 1. Credit_Cards field for the order should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 digits of the card number for BOTH cards
2. The first credit card should NOT be listed twice. It should be sorted first because it was used first.

title: Verify multiple credit-card payments using the same payment method but different card numbers

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create an order and pay it partially with a credit card, leaving the balance on a receivable
2. In a subsequent transaction, pay the balance using a second credit card of the same payment method but a different card number.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 1. Credit_Cards field for the order should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 for EACH card (2 total), separated by a comma.
2. Cards should be listed in the order in which they were first used.

(This is a check to ensure they are not conflated.)

title: Verify multiple credit-card payments with different payment methods

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create an order and pay it partially with a credit card, leaving the balance on a receivable
2. In a subsequent transaction, pay the balance using a different credit card with a different payment method. The description for this payment method should sort alphabetically before the first payment's payment method--e.g., first pay with "Visa" and then "Aviator Visa."
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 1. Credit_Cards field for the order should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 for each card (2), separated by a comma.
2. Cards should be listed in the order in which they were first used, not by alpha sort.

title: Verify a payment with a non-credit card payment method

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. 1. Create an order and pay it in full with a non credit card payment.
custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. 1. Credit_Cards field for the order should be null.

title: Verify a combination of credit card and non credit card payment methods

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. 1. Create an order and, in the first transaction, do a split payment: Pay it partially with a credit card and partially with a non-credit card payment method, covering the entire balance.
custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. 1. Credit_Cards field for the order should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 for the card, with no reference to the other payment.

title: Verify a credit card payment that affected multiple orders

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create 2 orders with receivables.
2. In the same transaction, pay both orders with one credit card.
custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. 1. Credit_Cards field for both Order1 and Order2 should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 for the card.

title: Verify a credit card payment that was distributed from one order to another.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create an order (Order1) and pay for it with a credit-card payment.
2. Create another order (Order2) with a receivable.
3. In the same cart, return/refund the items on Order 1 and make a Cash Receipt on Order 2. This redistributes the payment to Order 2, which is now technically paid by the card.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 1. Credit_Cards field for both Order1 and Order2 should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 for the card.
2. Field should NOT be null for Order1.

title: Verify a credit-card payment that is completely refunded.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create an order (Order1) and pay for it with a credit-card payment.
2. Return everything on the order and refund it to the same card.
custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. 1. Credit_Cards field for Order1 should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 for the card. It should NOT be null.

title: Check formatting of the Credit_Cards field

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create a payment method with a credit-card payment type and a description that contains a comma and a quotation mark.
2. Create an order and do a split payment, using the payment method you just created as well as two other credit-card payments for two other cards (3 total).
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 1. Credit_Cards field for the order should have the payment method description followed by the last 4 for each card (3), separated by a comma. Quotation mark should be transformed into a single quote.
2. Cards should be listed in the order in which they were first used, not by alpha sort.
3. Text should be wrapped in quotation marks.
